title: Primary Line Down Alerts
body: To All LFCU,  There are still severl outstanding LINE DOWN alrets at the following addresses:  -17 Elizabeth Street  -214 Carson St  -11 Columbia ST  -810 Ferry St  -N 11th St  -400 PERRIN AVE  Skip Mills  Utility Supervisor - LFCU

title: Primary Line Down Alerts - URGENT CORRECTION
body: To All LFCU,  Correction to last email, please disregard alert for 810 Ferry St, area too dangerous to approach until additional work done on street.  Please do not enter area withour approval from myself.  Skip Mills  Utility Supvervisor - LFCU

title: Out for day
body: To All LFCU Supervisory staff,  I am out for the rest of today, not feelingwell.  Skip Mills  Utility Supvervisor - LFCU

title: Contrato n22
body: Sector: X11.  Objective: Investigate the sewers and report only to me.  Reward: 22 MCr.

title: Password Security Reminder
body: Hello Skip,  This is a reminder that all employees should be diligent about password security as there have been several instances of passwords left on notes on or around desks and workstations.  I do not need to remind you that this is a breach of company policy as well as a serious security risk and any employees, regardless of supervisory status found to be in violation will be subject to mandatory security training as well as a formal write-up if corrective actions are not taken as soon as possible.  Please let me know if you have any questions.  Thanks,  Michael Genslinger  Security Supervisor - LFCU
